content: Despite the macroeconomic pressures on advertising prices, we have grown our gross profit over the last eight quarters by more than 4 times to a record high of $16.6 million this quarter while nearly doubling gross margin in that same time frame to 32.7%. But as I highlighted in my opening remarks, our continued revenue diversification strategy pushed Q3 to a record gross profit of $16.6 million, up 64% and from $10.1 million last year.
